hero.headline: Your money isn't disappearing â€” it's just hiding.
hero.subheadline: Small daily purchases add up fast. Coffee. Lunch. Subscriptions. Delivery. Spair shows you exactly where your money goes â€” so you can take control.

items.a: Yes. We use bank-level encryption and never sell your information. Your data is private and in your control.
Yes. Cancel anytimeâ€”your plan stays active until the end of your billing cycle (monthly or annual). No questions asked.

items.q: Do I need to connect my bank?
items.a: No. You can add accounts and transactions manually or import from CSV. Connect only what you're comfortable with.

items.q: Can I use it with my partner?
items.a: Yes. Household sharing lets you invite your partner or family to the same household so you can manage money together.
Yes. Spair highlights recurring spending and subscriptions so you can see what you're paying regularly.
Spair is a responsive web appâ€”you can use it on your phone's browser. A dedicated mobile app may come later.

pricingSection.description: Start your 30-day free trial. You'll only be charged after the trial ends. Cancel anytimeâ€”your plan stays active until the end of your billing cycle (monthly or annual).

dashboard.whatIsSpairScoreDescription: Spair Score is your financial health rating from 0 to 100. It reflects your ability to afford your lifestyle, absorb shocks, and keep healthy money habits â€” not how much you have. The score is coaching-oriented and action-driven: it helps you see what to improve and how.

helpSupport.faqDescription: Find answers to the most common questions about Spair Money
helpSupport.contactDescription: Still need help? Send us a message and we'll respond within 24 hours
helpSupport.name: Name
helpSupport.subject: Subject
helpSupport.subjectPlaceholder: What can we help you with?
helpSupport.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or issue...
helpSupport.messageSentDescription: We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
helpSupport.addTransactionQ: How do I add a transaction?
helpSupport.addTransactionA: Navigate to the Transactions page and click the "Add Transaction" button. Fill in the details including amount, category, date, and description, then save.
helpSupport.createBudgetQ: How do I create a budget?
helpSupport.createBudgetA: Go to the Budgets page and click "Create Budget". Select a category, set your monthly limit, and choose the time period. You can track your spending against the budget throughout the month.
helpSupport.shareAccountQ: Can I share my account with family members?
helpSupport.shareAccountA: Yes! With paid plans, you can invite household members to share access to your financial data. Go to Settings > Members to invite family members.
helpSupport.upgradePlanQ: How do I upgrade my plan?
helpSupport.upgradePlanA: Visit Settings > Billing to view your current plan and upgrade options. You can upgrade at any time, and the new plan will be effective immediately.
helpSupport.cancelSubscriptionQ: How do I cancel my subscription?
helpSupport.cancelSubscriptionA: Go to Settings > Billing and click "Manage Subscription". You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.
helpSupport.dataSecurityA: Absolutely. We use bank-level encryption to protect your data. All information is stored securely and we never share your financial data with third parties. See our Privacy Policy for more details.
helpSupport.importCsvQ: How do I import transactions from CSV?
helpSupport.importCsvA: On the Transactions page, click "Import" and select your CSV file. Make sure your CSV includes columns for date, amount, description, and category. Our system will guide you through mapping the columns.
helpSupport.exportDataA: Yes, you can export your transactions, budgets, and other data at any time. Go to Reports and use the export feature to download your data in CSV format.
